parameters.name: Subscription

content.query:
let TotalAlerts = prancer_CL
    | where act_s == "message" and severity_s != '' and iff('{Subscription}' != "", data_data_resourceID_s contains '{Subscription}', true)
    | summarize arg_max(data_data_configId_s, data_alert_name_s, data_alert_url_s) by data_data_configId_s, data_alert_name_s, data_alert_url_s, severity_s
    | summarize count()
    | extend AlertType = "Application Alerts";
let HighRiskAlerts = prancer_CL
    | where act_s == "message" and severity_s == "High" and iff('{Subscription}' != "", data_data_resourceID_s contains '{Subscription}', true)
    | summarize arg_max(data_data_configId_s, data_alert_name_s, data_alert_url_s) by data_data_configId_s, data_alert_name_s, data_alert_url_s
    | summarize count()
    | extend AlertType = "High Risk Alerts";
union TotalAlerts, HighRiskAlerts
| project AlertType, Count = count_
| order by AlertType desc

union prancer_CL
| where act_s == "message" and severity_s != '' and iff('{Subscription}' != "", data_data_resourceID_s contains '{Subscription}', true)
| summarize arg_max(data_data_configId_s, data_alert_name_s, data_alert_url_s) by data_data_configId_s, data_alert_name_s, data_alert_url_s, severity_s
| summarize Count = count() by severity_s
| extend Order = case(severity_s == "High", 1, severity_s == "Medium", 2, severity_s == "Low", 3, severity_s == "Informational", 4, 5)
| order by Order asc
| project severity_s, Count

union prancer_CL
| where deviceProduct_s != 'pentesting'  and iff('{Subscription}' != "", data_data_snapshots_s contains '{Subscription}', true)
| extend snapshot = parse_json(data_data_snapshots_s)
| mv-expand snapshot 
| extend
    id = tostring(snapshot.id),
    structure = tostring(snapshot.structure),
    reference = tostring(snapshot.reference),
    source = tostring(snapshot.source),
    collection = tostring(snapshot.collection),
    type = tostring(snapshot.type),
    region = tostring(snapshot.region),
    resourceTypes = tostring(snapshot.resourceTypes),
    path = tostring(snapshot.path)
| summarize arg_min(id, *) by path, data_data_title_s
| summarize count() by data_data_result_s

union prancer_CL
| where act_s == "message" and severity_s ==  '{pRisk}' and iff('{Subscription}' != "", data_data_resourceID_s contains '{Subscription}', true)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by name_s, data_data_url_s, data_data_param_s 
| project-rename Name = name_s, Severity = severity_s, Config_ID = data_data_configId_s, URL = data_alert_url_s, Collection = collection_s, Company = companyName_s, MITRE_ID = data_alert_mitreId_s

union prancer_CL
| where act_s == "message" and severity_s == '{pRisk}' and name_s == '{pAlertName}'  and iff('{Subscription}' != "", data_data_resourceID_s contains '{Subscription}', true)
| project-rename Name = name_s, Severity = severity_s, Config_ID = data_data_configId_s, URL = data_alert_url_s, Collection = data_data_applicationName_s, MITRE = data_alert_mitreId_s, Company = companyName_s
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by URL, Config_ID
//| project name_s = Name, severity_s = Severity, data_data_configId_s = Config_ID, data_alert_url_s = URL, TimeGenerated
| project Company, Collection, Name, Severity, MITRE, URL, data_alert_solution_s, data_alert_wascid_s, data_alert_cweid_s, data_data_requestBody_s, data_data_requestHeader_s, data_data_responseHeader_s, data_data_responseBody_s, data_alert_description_s, data_alert_other_s, data_alert_evidence_s

union prancer_CL
| where deviceProduct_s != 'pentesting' and data_data_result_s == '{pInfraPassFail}' and iff('{Subscription}' != "", data_data_snapshots_s contains '{Subscription}', true)
| extend snapshot = parse_json(data_data_snapshots_s)
| mv-expand snapshot 
| extend id = tostring(snapshot.id),
          structure = tostring(snapshot.structure),
          reference = tostring(snapshot.reference),
          source = tostring(snapshot.source),
          collection = tostring(snapshot.collection),
          type = tostring(snapshot.type),
          region = tostring(snapshot.region),
          resourceTypes = tostring(snapshot.resourceTypes),
          path = tostring(snapshot.path)
| extend parsedJson = parse_json(data_data_tags_s)
| extend complianceArray = parsedJson[0].compliance
| extend compliance = strcat_array(complianceArray, ", ")
| where structure == 'azure'
| project id, structure, Finding = data_data_title_s, Result = data_data_result_s, Type = type,  Region = region, Resource = path, compliance, data_data_title_s, data_data_description_s, data_data_remediation_description_s

union prancer_CL
| where data_data_resourceID_s != ""  and data_data_cloudType_s == 'azure'
| summarize count_unique_resourceID = dcount(data_data_resourceID_s)
| extend label = "Vulnerable VMs"

union prancer_CL
| where deviceProduct_s == 'azure'
| extend Path = tostring(parse_json(data_data_snapshots_s)[0].path)
| extend snapshot = parse_json(data_data_snapshots_s)
| mv-expand snapshot 
| extend
    id = tostring(snapshot.id)
| summarize arg_min(id, *) by Path, data_data_title_s
| summarize
    TotalCount = count(),
    UniqueCount = dcount(deviceProduct_s),
    PathUniqueCount = dcount(Path)
| project
    Resource = "Total Resource Alerts",
    Count = TotalCount,
    UniqueCount,
    PathUniqueCount

union prancer_CL
| where deviceProduct_s == 'azure'
| extend Path = tostring(parse_json(data_data_snapshots_s)[0].path)
| summarize TotalCount = count(), UniqueCount = dcount(deviceProduct_s), PathUniqueCount = dcount(Path)
| project Resource = "<Total Count>", Count = TotalCount, UniqueCount, PathUniqueCount, unique = 'Unique Resources'

union prancer_CL
| where data_data_resourceID_s != "" and data_data_resourceID_s contains "/"  and iff('{Subscription}' != "", data_data_resourceID_s contains '{Subscription}', true)
| extend Resource = data_data_resourceID_s
| extend resourceId = tostring(split(data_data_resourceID_s, "/")[-1]) 
| extend Type = tostring(split(data_data_resourceID_s, "/")[-3])
| extend Subscription = tostring(split(data_data_resourceID_s, "/")[2])
| extend SeverityValue = case(
    data_alert_cvss_severity_s == "information", 1,
    data_alert_cvss_severity_s == "low", 2,
    data_alert_cvss_severity_s == "medium", 3,
    data_alert_cvss_severity_s == "high", 4,
    0)
| summarize Count = count(), MaxSeverity = arg_max(SeverityValue, data_alert_cvss_severity_s) by Resource, resourceId, Type, Subscription
| project-rename Severity = data_alert_cvss_severity_s
content.title: App Findings

content.query:
union prancer_CL
| where deviceProduct_s == 'azure' and iff('{Subscription}' != "", data_data_snapshots_s contains '{Subscription}', true)
| project Resource = tostring(parse_json(data_data_snapshots_s)[0].path), Type = parse_json(data_data_snapshots_s)[0].type, Subscription = tostring(split(parse_json(data_data_snapshots_s)[0].path, "/")[2])
| summarize Types = make_set(Type), Subscriptions = make_set(Subscription), Count = count() by Resource
content.title: Infra findings

content.query:
union prancer_CL
| where data_data_resourceID_s == replace('"', '', '{resourceID}')
| where name_s  != ''
| project-rename Name = name_s, Config_ID = data_data_configId_s, URL = data_alert_url_s, Severity = data_alert_risk_s, Collection = data_data_applicationName_s, Company = companyName_s, MITRE = data_alert_mitreId_s, Description = data_alert_description_s
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Name, Config_ID, URL, Severity, Collection, Company
| order by TimeGenerated
